thread.title: Scarlett Dante

author: Scarlett Dante
title: Scarlett Dante
text:
I'm the girl who would prefer to be in workout clothes on the weekend than business clothes during the week. I take my workout apparel very seriously...Fabletics has got me covered on the workout side from the best leggings and capris to tops I also get complimented on and never get in the way of what I'm doing when I exercise.
Now Fabletics totally has me covered at work! Sweaters, skirts, tops - all perfect for work with the same comfort as my coveted workout clothes.
I always look forward to the first of the month for the new outfits they have online. I love the collections they feature each month. I also LOVE redeeming my rewards points, it's a total perk.
I REALLY REALLY REALLY wish they would open an in-person store in the Bay Area, preferably in the Stoneridge Mall in Pleasanton. I see so many women in this area with Fabletics apparel - in the gym and on the street!
As a two-year Fabletics advocate, please make my dream come true...
